translation.en: [announcer] The train approaching platform three is
the 20:55 service to London Euston.
translation.ko: 런던 유스턴행 오후 8시 55분 열차가 3번 승강장으로 들어옵니다

translation.en: [David] Cover yourself up, Ella. We’re not there yet. Good girl.
translation.ko: 엘라, 덮고 자 아직 더 가야 해, 그렇지

translation.en: Shh! Shh! Shh! Not our stop yet. Back to sleep.
translation.ko: 도착 안 했어 더 자도 돼

translation.en: [man] Stand clear of the doors! Stand clear of the doors!
Excuse me.
Is everything all right in there?
Sorry, madam, you wouldn't mind looking after my kids for a minute, would you?
I’ll be right back.
-Yeah. No problem. -Thank you very much. I’ll be right back.
translation.ko: - 잠깐이면 돼요 - 네, 그러죠 감사합니다 금방 올게요

translation.en: ...suspicious in toilet C-D.
Sergeant David Budd, Metropolitan Police. What’s going on?
translation.ko: 전 런던 경찰청의 버드 경사입니다 무슨 일이죠?

translation.en: You’ve got an intelligence report for an Asian male in his 20s?
How do you know about that?
I saw you checking out a guy. He’s fine. I saw someone suspicious at Marston.
translation.ko: 아까 한 남자를 관찰하는 걸 봤어요 그 사람은 이상 없는데 마스턴역에서 수상한 자를 봤죠

translation.en: I don't know if he boarded the train. He could be in the toilet.
translation.ko: 그자가 열차를 탔다면 아까 그 화장실에 있을 겁니다

translation.en: Look, I’m an operational firearms commander with Specialist Protection.
translation.ko: 전 특수 경호대의 특수 무장 경찰이에요

translation.en: What’s the plan?
British Transport Police have put out an alert on a possible suicide bomber
translation.ko: 영국 교통 경찰에 제보가 들어왔는데 자살 테러범이

translation.en: attempting to board a London-bound service.
We've been ordered to stop the train at Barnet Shed. It's a derelict depot.
translation.ko: 바넷 셰드에서 정차하라는 지시를 받았어요 후미진 곳의 폐쇄된 역이죠

translation.en: -They’re going to board the train. -How long till we're there?
translation.ko: 그 사람들이 열차에 오를 거래요 시간이 얼마나 남았죠?

translation.en: [sighs] Seven minutes.
He’ll detonate in the carriage for maximum casualties.
translation.ko: 놈이 화장실에선 안 터뜨려요 최대한 많이 죽이려고 객차를 노릴 거예요

translation.en: Right, stick with me. What’s your name?
-Uh, Sandra. -Give me your number.
-I need to call this in. -Do it.
This way, Sarge. We’ll take you down to trackside.
I need a few more minutes. Is that all right?
translation.ko: 애들 좀 몇 분 더 봐주실래요?

translation.en: -Yeah. No problem. -Thank you.
-[phone rings] -Hello?
I can’t let him out. There’s dozens of passengers, my kids included.
translation.ko: - 여보세요 - 나오지 못하게 막아야 해요 열차에 수십 명이 탔어요 제 아이들도 있고요

translation.en: -What-- -Can you unlock the exit doors...
-Hello? -[rumble of train in tunnel]
Shit.
Shit.
[breathes heavily] Come on. Come on. Come on. Come on. Come on...
-What I said is-- -The stop’s just a few minutes away.
translation.ko: - 제 말은... - 곧 도착하는데 그냥 가만히 있는 게...

translation.en: If the train brakes, he’ll know it’s an unscheduled stop.
translation.ko: 예정에 없던 역에 서면 놈이 눈치채고

translation.en: He’ll detonate the device in the carriage. Can you unlock the doors as we're moving?
translation.ko: 객차에서 폭탄을 터뜨릴 거예요 주행 중에 승강구 열 수 있어요?

translation.en: [stutters] Yes.
When I say so, do it. Let me take care of the rest.
translation.ko: 신호를 주면 문을 여세요 나머지는 저에게 맡기고요

translation.en: -The rest of what? -To throw him off the train.
Stand by.
Do it now.
Subject does not appear to be carrying a device. He's an Asian male, late 20s,
translation.ko: 용의자에게 폭탄이 안 보여요 20대 후반 아시아계 남성

translation.en: wearing a black baseball cap, gray T-shirt,
translation.ko: 검정 야구 모자에 회색 티를 입고 녹색 코트를 들었어요

translation.en: carrying a green coat. Advise SCO19 he’s heading towards
translation.ko: 검정 야구 모자에 회색 티를 입고 녹색 코트를 들었어요 열차 앞으로 가고 있다고 특공대에 전하세요

translation.en: the front of the train and does not appear to be a threat. Repeat, not a threat.
translation.ko: 열차 앞으로 가고 있다고 특공대에 전하세요 위험해 보이진 않아요 다시 말하지만 안 위험해 보여요

translation.en: I’m going to examine the toilet for signs of a device.
-[over radio] Trojan, Control, message. -[woman] Trojan receiving.
[Control] Subject is at front of train, no visible device,
translation.ko: 용의자는 열차 앞쪽에 있고 폭탄은 안 보이지만

translation.en: to be detained for questioning. Proceed as planned.
Copy.
Train ETA’s three minutes. Three minutes!
As-salaam ‘alaykum.
I just want to talk.
That’s all.
I can see you’re as scared as I am.
Miss, I just want to help you.
You don’t have to do this.
-You can change your mind. -[pants]
Don’t do that. Please don’t do that. Don't move. Stay still.
translation.ko: 그러지 말아요, 제발 움직이지 말아요, 부탁이에요

translation.en: Please, just stay still. Please!
Just stay still. Don’t move. Please. Please.
You don’t want to do this.
You don’t look like you do.
Listen, the counter-terrorism unit know about a potential incident on this train.
translation.ko: 들어봐요 대테러 특수 수사대가 이미 당신들 계획을 다 알고 있어요

translation.en: What I’d like to do is just tell them...
...that you’re willing to talk.
Does that sound okay to you?
Just talk... is that a start?
There’s a second bomber, but we’re talking.
translation.ko: 폭파범이 한 명 더 있는데 지금 대화 중이에요

translation.en: Now, write this down.
Young Asian female, equipped with an explosives vest.
translation.ko: 받아 적으세요 젊은 아시아계 여성이 폭탄 조끼를 입고 있는데

translation.en: Advise SCO19 she’s willing to talk.
Request armed officers hold back from boarding the train...
and that Bomb Disposal and negotiators are deployed as operational priority.
translation.ko: 폭발물 처리반과 협상팀 배치가 우선이라고 전하세요

translation.en: But firstly, right now, evacuate the adjacent carriages.
translation.ko: 하지만 그 전에 옆의 객차를 모두 비우고요

translation.en: Yeah, okay.
This is your guard speaking.
Would all passengers in carriage D please make your way
translation.ko: D 객차의 모든 승객은 E와 F 객차로 대피하고

translation.en: at once into Carriages E and F?
And would all passengers in Carriage C...
Come on. Wake up. We’ve got to move. Come on. Wake up.
translation.ko: 얘들아, 어서 일어나 빨리 가야 해, 일어나자

translation.en: -...into carriages D... -Where’s Daddy?
-Wake up. -...and A.
I’ll just have a look and make sure that everyone’s getting out, okay?
translation.ko: 모두가 잘 대피하는지 잠깐만 확인할게요 괜찮죠?

translation.en: All right, I’m not going anywhere. I’m staying here.
It’s okay. It’s okay.
My name’s David... David Budd.
translation.ko: 제 이름은 데이비드예요 데이비드 버드 당신 이름은 뭐예요?

translation.en: What’s yours?
[whimpers softly] Nadia.
The man that was in here before, is that your husband?
Yeah?
Your husband wants you to die?
You don’t have to be a martyr, Nadia. We can deactivate this device.
translation.ko: 자신을 희생하지 말아요 우리가 폭탄을 해체하고

translation.en: We can protect you. You don’t have to see him again if you don't want to.
translation.ko: 남편이 못 찾아오게 지켜줄게요 남편 얼굴은 다시는 안 봐도 돼요

translation.en: Hey, Nadia. Nadia, look at me.
I’m just as scared as you are. I promise.
I’m just bringing my kids back from visiting my mum.
You have children? Yes. I do, two.
That’s Ella. She’s ten. Charlie, he’s eight.
I just want to take them home to their mum.
[Control] Trojan, we’ve got a sit rep from the train guard.
translation.ko: 트로전, 여기는 통제실 열차에서 상황 보고가 들어왔다

translation.en: There’s an off-duty specialist protection officer on board, PS David Budd.
translation.ko: 비번인 특수 경호대 경찰이 열차에 탑승 중이다 - 이름은 데이비드 버드 경사다 - 알았다

translation.en: Received.
Stand by!
-It’s all right. -[pants and whimpers softly]
Everything’s going to be all right.
Stop! Please! Stop! Listen to me. Listen to me.
translation.ko: 잠깐! 부탁이에요 내 말 좀 들어봐요

translation.en: Why would someone you love want you to kill yourself? You’ve been brainwashed.
translation.ko: 남편이 당신을 사랑하면 죽으라고 했겠어요? 당신은 세뇌당했어요

translation.en: He has. You have. And I’d know.
I was in Afghanistan. I saw mates get killed. Nearly got killed myself.
translation.ko: 난 아프가니스탄에 있었죠 동료들이 죽는 걸 봤고 저도 죽을 뻔했어요

translation.en: For what? Nothing.
Politicians... cowards and liars. Ours and theirs.
People full of talk but will never spill a drop of their own blood, but you and I,
translation.ko: 말만 거창하고 자기들은 피 한 방울 안 흘리죠 하지만 당신과 나 같은 사람들은 큰 상처를 입어요

translation.en: we’re just collateral damage.
translation.ko: 하지만 당신과 나 같은 사람들은 큰 상처를 입어요

translation.en: Don’t let them win, Nadia.
-Don’t let them win. -[sobs softly]
[David] Police officer! Don't shoot!
All right, stay right here. I’m not going anywhere.
translation.ko: 알았죠? 여기 있어요 나도 같이 있을게요

translation.en: -[distant yelling] -You hear that?
That’s them evacuating everyone from the train.
So, it’s just you and I. It’s just us here. Okay?
[policeman] Armed Police! Armed Police! Get down on the ground!
Put your hands on your head and get down! Get down!
Don't move.
Stay exactly where you are, Nadia. Don’t move, okay? All right.
translation.ko: 나디아, 꼼짝하지 말아요 움직이면 안 돼요, 알았죠?

translation.en: [Tanner] Armed Police!
translation.ko: - 무장 경찰이다 - 특수 경호대 버드 경사입니다

translation.en: PS David Budd! Specialist Protection! Don’t shoot!
translation.ko: - 무장 경찰이다 - 특수 경호대 버드 경사입니다 쏘면 안 돼요

translation.en: We know who you are. Stand clear.
It’s all right. I’m not going anywhere. Just stay very still now, Nadia. Okay?
translation.ko: 괜찮아요 난 아무 데도 안 가요 가만히 있어야 해요, 나디아

translation.en: David, work with me, yeah? You’ve done a great job,
translation.ko: 데이비드, 협조하시죠 오늘 활약은 좋았지만 여기 작전 지휘관은 나예요

translation.en: but you’re not OFC here. I am.
translation.ko: 오늘 활약은 좋았지만 여기 작전 지휘관은 나예요

translation.en: I need you to stand down, nice and easy.
[David whispers] I’m not going anywhere. I’m staying with you.
translation.ko: 난 아무 데도 안 가요 당신 옆에 있을 거예요

translation.en: It’s all right. Nothing’s changed. It’s just us talking here.
translation.ko: 괜찮아요, 달라지는 건 없어요 우리는 얘기만 할 거예요

translation.en: -Just stay really, really still. Okay? -Move away from the subject.
translation.ko: - 그냥 가만히 있으면 돼요 - 어서 비켜요

translation.en: In position.
[David whispers] It’s okay, Nadia.
[Control] TFC reports sniper in position. Critical shot authorized.
-Received. -[David] Nadia, I need you to trust me.
-[she breathes heavily] -I’m going to speak to this officer.
She’s cooperating. She intends to surrender.
She does not intend to activate the device. Get Expo here.
translation.ko: 폭탄 안 터뜨리니까 폭발물 처리반 불러요

translation.en: They’re here. Now, move away.
It’s all right. It’s okay. I’m not going anywhere.
translation.ko: 걱정하지 말아요 전 아무 데도 안 가요

translation.en: -David, stand clear. -I’m not.
Nadia, you need to show them you’re not going to detonate the device.
translation.ko: 폭탄을 안 터뜨린다는 걸 보여줘야 하니까

translation.en: When I ask you, I want you to raise your arms to either side.
translation.ko: 제가 시키면 두 팔을 들어 올려요

translation.en: -Can you do that? -This is your final warning. Stand clear.
translation.ko: - 할 수 있죠? - 마지막 경고예요, 비켜요

translation.en: [David] Nadia’s going to spread her arms and we’re going to stay put
translation.ko: 나디아가 양팔을 들 거예요 폭발물 처리반이 올 때까지 우린 여기서 꼼짝도 안 해요

translation.en: -and wait for Expo. Do that now. -[Tanner] Trojan OFC to TFC.
translation.ko: 폭발물 처리반이 올 때까지 우린 여기서 꼼짝도 안 해요 - 여기는 트로전 - 이제 양팔 들어요

translation.en: PS Budd was given repeated warnings to stand down, but failed to cooperate.
translation.ko: 버드 경사가 수차례 경고에도 협조를 거부해서

translation.en: We have no clear shot of the subject.
That's it. Nice and slow. Stay close to me. Come in.
translation.ko: 그래요, 천천히 올려요 나한테 가까이 와요

translation.en: Come in close to me. That’s it. All right, doing really well.
Doing really well, Nadia.
That gun, that’s an MCX carbine. A bullet from that would go through the both of us.
translation.ko: 저 총은 MCX 카빈총인데 저거로 쏜 총알이면 우리 둘 다 뚫을 수 있지만

translation.en: I’m trusting they're not going to shoot one of their own. All right?
translation.ko: 저들이 같은 경찰을 죽이진 않을 거라고 전 믿어요 알았죠? 저 믿죠?

translation.en: You trust me too?
Okay.
Shit. Shit. Oh, come on.
[Control] Sniper one, do you have a clean shot?
Negative.
Stay in there. Don’t go out.
Stay here. Stay here with me.
translation.ko: 나랑 같이 있어요 아무 데도 가지 말아요

translation.en: -You don't have to go anywhere. -Subject required out of toilet for shot.
translation.ko: 나랑 같이 있어요 아무 데도 가지 말아요 대상이 화장실에서 나와야 쏠 수 있다

translation.en: -Received. -Get Expo here now!
David, I need the subject to step out of the toilet.
[David] She’s going to stay and wait for Expo.
translation.ko: 폭발물 처리반이 올 때까지 한 발짝도 안 움직일 거예요

translation.en: -[Tanner] Come out of the toilet. -Don't move.
-Come out of the toilet. -Stay still for me.
translation.ko: - 화장실에서 나와요 - 날 위해 가만히 있을 거죠?

translation.en: That’s it. You’re doing really good.
translation.ko: - 잘하고 있어요 - 당장 나와요, 내 말 들어요

translation.en: Get Expo here!
-Stand aside. -Don’t fire! Do not do this!
translation.ko: - 폭발물 처리반 불러요! - 비켜요 쏘지 말아요! 쏘면 안 돼!

translation.en: You need to come out of the toilet.
-Nadia, don't move. Please don’t move. -Step out of the toilet!
translation.ko: - 나디아, 움직이지 말아요 - 당장 나와요 - 안 돼요 - 나와!

translation.en: -Don’t do this. Please don’t do this! -David, stand down! Out! Out!
translation.ko: 쏘지 말아요 - 명령이다, 나와! - 안 돼요!

translation.en: -Stay there. That's it. -Get out of the fucking toilet!
translation.ko: - 안 돼요! - 나오라고! - 화장실에서 나와! - 안 돼!

translation.en: -No! -[Nadia sobs]
No shot.
All right, don’t shoot. Don’t shoot.
All right, Nadia. Hold tight.
That’s it. Just keep moving. Hold tight.
translation.ko: 바로 그거예요 절 잡고 계속 돌아요

translation.en: Okay.
All right.
[Control] Control to Sniper one. Can you execute critical shot?
translation.ko: 여기는 통제실 1번 저격수, 쏠 수 있겠나?

translation.en: Negative.
That’s it, Nadia.
Keep moving. Just...
[Control] No clean shot available, repeat no clean shot available.
-[David] That’s it. -Expo.
[Control] Control. Sending Expo in now.
-Expo is coming. -Thank you.
All right, Nadia. I've got you.
[Karen] Explosives Officer.
[David] Stay calm. Stay calm.
[Karen] Miss. My name’s Karen. Now, I need you to put your arms down.
Good. Now, turn your palms towards me.
And do not move.
Nadia, I’m going to step to the side. I’ll be right here.
translation.ko: 나디아, 전 옆으로 비킬게요 여기 있을 거예요

translation.en: [Karen] I’m moving towards you now.
Nadia... now, I need to ask you...
this object in your hand is the initiation device?
Yes.
Does anyone else have control of this device?
translation.ko: 다른 사람도 이 장치를 조종할 수 있나요?

translation.en: No.
Straighten your arm, please.
Arms up, please.
All the way up.
Turn around for me, please.
I’m going to remove the belt.
-I need everyone out now. -Open the door.
I’m going to step off the train, then ask you to follow me, all right?
translation.ko: 제가 먼저 내린 다음에 따라 내리라고 할게요

translation.en: Okay, nice and slowly.
Keep your hands where we can see them.
-Stay calm. -[man] Stay still! We'll lift you down!
-Stay still! -[husband] Nadia!
[officer] Don't look over there. Look down at the ground.
translation.ko: 저쪽 보지마, 눈 깔아! 바닥에 시선 고정해!

translation.en: -Stop resisting! Go! Go! Let's go. -[siren wails]
It’s over. You’re safe now.
He can’t hurt you. No one’s going to hurt you.
[David] Come on, out you get.
-Thanks, mate. -Oh, God!
-Mummy! -Thank God! Come here.
-Mummy! -Oh! [sobs in relief]
Aw, sweetheart.
Sorry. By the time I’d given a statement I’d...
-[sobs in relief] -[David] Love, it’s all right.
-Thank you. -I’m fine. We’re all fine.
It’s all right.
-Night-night, sweetheart. I love you. -Night-night, Charlie bear. Good night.
translation.ko: 잘 자, 공주님 사랑해 - 잘 자, 우리 곰돌이 - 안녕히 주무세요

translation.en: [Vicky chuckles] Night-night, sweetheart. Night, big man.
translation.ko: - 잘 자, 내 사랑 - 잘 자라

translation.en: Night.
-I love you. -I love you, too.
-[sighs] -They’ll be all right, love.
-I should be heading off. -You don’t have to.
You sure?
You feeling okay?
[sighs] Come on. Let’s talk downstairs.
Oh, for Christ sake, Dave.
Sorry.
I’m sorry. I’m a fucking idiot. I’m sorry. I’m sorry.
[news report #1] Terrorists armed with a suicide vest
boarded the London-bound train just before...
[#2] ...the Prime Minister called a meeting of COBRA...
[#3] No one was injured in the attack on a packed train en route...
translation.ko: 비상 대책 회의를 열고... 유스턴행 열차의 승객은 전원 무사합니다

translation.en: [#4] We urge members of the public to remain vigilant.
[#5] ...Joint Terrorism Analysis Centre will assess the threat level...
translation.ko: 합동테러분석센터 J-TAC가 테러 위험 수준을 평가하고...

translation.en: [Prime Minister] ...resolute in our determination to root out terrorism...
translation.ko: 정부는 단호한 의지로 테러를 뿌리 뽑을 것입니다

translation.en: [#6] ...has the raised the threat level to substantial.
[#7] What I’m being told is most worrying

translation.en: about yesterday’s incident is the exceptionally high level
translation.ko: 어제 사건과 관련해 가장 우려되는 점은 자살 테러 미수범들이 사용한 폭탄 조끼의 기술 수준이

translation.en: of sophistication of the explosive vest employed by the would-be attackers.
translation.ko: 자살 테러 미수범들이 사용한 폭탄 조끼의 기술 수준이 상당히 높았다는 점입니다

translation.en: It would appear most likely that this is the work of a terror cell

translation.en: and there may be accomplices still at large.
[man] Frank Gardner, our security correspondent.
-[guard] Morning, Sarge. -Cheers, Ken.
translation.ko: - 경사님, 좋은 아침입니다 - 잘 있었나, 켄?

translation.en: ...the 1st of October device and the real concern that it represents
translation.ko: 10월 1일 열차 테러에 사용된 폭탄의 기술 수준이 상당한 우려를 자아내고

translation.en: a new and devastating threat to national security
translation.ko: 국가 안보가 심각한 위협에 직면한 가운데

translation.en: has led the Joint Terrorism Analysis Centre
to raise the UK’s terror threat level to substantial.
translation.ko: 영국의 테러 경보 수준을 한 단계 격상시켰습니다

translation.en: We’re joined now by the Home Secretary, the Right Honorable Julia Montague MP.

translation.en: [Julia] Before we begin, Nick, I’d like to pay tribute to the courage

translation.en: of all members of the police and security service
whose selfless actions prevented an appalling act of terrorism.
-[woman] Bit of a day yesterday. -Mm.

translation.en: -I’m fine, thanks, ma’am. -It’s a miracle you’re in one piece.
translation.ko: 전 괜찮습니다 안 다친 게 기적이야

translation.en: We’re very lucky the bomber changed her mind.
Hm. Not that she’s saying much, and the husband’s saying nothing.

translation.en: It seems like when the time came, she froze, and the husband panicked.
translation.ko: 거사 직전에 여자는 얼고 남자는 놀라서 달아난 거죠

translation.en: Yup.
Great job, David, a credit to the Branch. Thank you, ma’am.
So far you’ve acted as PPO to visiting foreign dignitaries?
-That's right, ma’am. -The Commissioner’s ordered me to review
specialist protection on senior politicians.
I’m assigning you to a cabinet minister, the Home Secretary.
translation.ko: 앞으로 장관 경호를 맡도록 - 내무 장관이야 - 알겠습니다

translation.en: Very good, ma’am.
It’s a move up.
Yes. Thank you, ma’am.
Good man. Ma’am.
My Glock and two magazines, please.
That’s the principal now, Skipper, in the first car. The backup’s behind.

translation.en: -Ma’am. -Kim.
Ma’am, this is PS Budd, the new PPO.
Pleasure to meet you, ma’am. I was wondering if we could discuss you using

translation.en: -the underground entrance from now on. -I’m late for a meeting.
Julia likes to be seen.
What’s happening with Andrew Marr?

translation.en: -I’ll chase them today. -I thought it was all confirmed.

And when were you planning to tell me?
-I was waiting for the right moment. -You didn’t find it.

[Seven-Two] Go ahead, Control, Seven-Two, over.

Terry’s been driving me for three years. I think he can be trusted

translation.en: to determine the fastest route.

translation.en: And how much longer will that take?
Can’t say for certain, ma’am.

translation.en: -Not a problem. Usual? -[sighs] Sure.

That's us plotting to build the Death Star. How long is this gonna take?

Just get on with it.
PC Knowles said your name’s Budd.

All is forgiven?

All is forgiven.

I, uh... uh, got this for later.

translation.en: -[Vicky] Hello. -Hiya, love.

-I’ve not even had a few drinks. -[Vicky sighs]

Let’s just have a chat.

No. Not like this.
Vicky.
Shit!

Home Secretary, two minutes till I take you through to the studio.
Thank you.
I bet the PM pulled out because he knew you’d do a much better job.

-Your decaf. -[squeals]
-Oh, my God! Oh, I’m so sorry -Christ!

-[giggles] -Shut up.

translation.en: -Fresh on this morning, ma’am. -[Rob] You’ve got to be kidding me!

Thank you.
Some privacy?
Yeah, of course.
Home Secretary, just how anxious should we be about this terrorist threat?

translation.en: -Is there another one around the corner? -We are a target.
translation.ko: 2차 테러가 곧 발생할까요? 우리는 테러의 표적이므로 절대 방심할 수 없는데

translation.en: We can’t be complacent.

a beefed-up Regulation of Investigatory Powers Act this year,

translation.en: to monitor phone calls, emails and social media without judicial review.

translation.en: Andrew, only those intent on acts of violence have anything to fear.

translation.en: The Prime Minister was quoted as saying:

the Taliban would govern Afghanistan in peace and harmony,

translation.en: and build a more secure future.

I can’t see any justification for believing
the Taliban would govern Afghanistan in peace and harmony,

translation.en: -Is there a point to this conversation? -You're not returning my calls.
translation.ko: - 요점이 뭐야? - 왜 내 전화 안 받아?

translation.en: Pardon me, ma’am, I’d prefer if you moved indoors.
translation.ko: 장관님, 실례지만 안전을 위해 실내로 이동하셔야 합니다

translation.en: You work for us, Plod, so wind your neck in.
translation.ko: 넌 아랫사람답게 입 좀 다물고 있지

translation.en: I’m the fucking Chief Whip. When I call, you answer.
translation.ko: 난 원내 총무야 내 전화는 받으라고

translation.en: We claim the center ground, but you’re heading off-piste.
translation.ko: 당신은 당과 상관없이 독자 행동을 하고 있어

translation.en: The PM can count on my full support.
Bullshit. He’s weakened. You’re making a move for the leadership.
translation.ko: 거짓말, 총리가 약해지니까 그 자리를 노리고 있잖아

translation.en: Sir, ma’am, I do need you both to move inside.
Can’t you call your monkey off? Throw him some nuts.
translation.ko: 저 원숭이 좀 치울 수 없어? 땅콩이라도 던져줘

translation.en: I’m mixed-race.
-[John] Hi. -John. Roger Penhaligon.
-You okay? -No. Not great.
I need to record my side of a conversation with one of the PPOs.
Are you... bi-racial?
No, ma’am.
Right, where were we?
[Rob] Right, great. This is a summary of the limitations in existing legislation.
-All clear, ma’am. -Oh.
Sergeant Budd.
Your shirt.
Thank you, ma’am.
I’m sorry about Chanel. She took her dismissal badly
translation.ko: 셔넬 일은 미안해요 해고 소식에 난동을 피우니까

translation.en: and my staff thought you’d be the best person to deal with it.
translation.ko: 우리 직원이 경사라면 잘 해결할 걸로 생각했더군요

translation.en: If you can talk someone out of blowing up a train...
-Want one? -On duty, ma’am.
Soft drinks in the fridge.
No. Thank you, ma’am.
Do you prefer David or Dave?
I answer to both, ma’am.
You won’t have heard yet,
but we are going to charge the male 1st-of-October attacker.
translation.ko: 열차 테러 미수 사건의 남자 용의자가 기소될 거예요

translation.en: He appears to have plausible links to Islamist terrorists,
translation.ko: 이슬람 테러 집단과 연결됐다는 증거가 있는데

translation.en: though I’m not at liberty to say more.
That's good news, thanks, ma’am.
And thanks to you, his wife’s alive to assist with our inquiries.
translation.ko: - 좋은 소식이네요 - 당신 덕분에 그자의 부인이 살아서 수사를 돕고 있어요

translation.en: It seems I’m constantly finding reasons to compliment you.
translation.ko: 버드 경사는 항상 칭찬할 일이 생기네요

translation.en: Not quite constantly.
Is there a Mrs. Budd?
Yes, ma’am. Vicky.
-We have two children. -Oh, what are their names?
-Ella and Charlie. -Oh.
Your shifts... must make home life difficult.
-I'm sorry. That was private. I... -No, it’s...
You’d know, ma’am, all these hours you work.
translation.ko: 장관님도 잘 아실 겁니다 워낙 늦게까지 일하시니까

translation.en: [chuckles] Goes with the territory.
Did you always want to be a politician? I hope you don’t mind me asking that.
translation.ko: 원래 정치인이 꿈이셨나요? 실례되는 질문이 아니라면...

translation.en: I was a criminal barrister.
I witnessed at first-hand how the causes of crime often have as much to do
with a person’s upbringing and social circumstances.
translation.ko: 양육 방식 또는 사회적 환경 때문이었죠

translation.en: I sought a role in which I could make a real difference.
translation.ko: 그래서 이 사회를 진짜 바꿔보고 싶었어요

translation.en: I’m keeping you.
May I ask, ma’am...
that interview you did on TV, did you mean what you said?
I’m sorry?
About the Middle East.
See, I don’t only say what the people want to hear.
translation.ko: 난 사람들이 듣고 싶은 말만 하지 않아요

translation.en: I’m about doing the right thing and making the hard choices.
translation.ko: 힘들어도 옳은 선택을 하는 게 내가 하는 일이에요

translation.en: The thing is, David/Dave, I don’t need you to vote for me...
translation.ko: 데이비드인지 데이브인지 잘 들어요 난 당신의 표는 필요 없어요

translation.en: only to protect me.
Rest assured, ma’am. I’ll do what’s required.
Ma’am.
[officer] Skipper.
Sorry, I was just getting ready for work.
I just wanted to apologize for the other night.
Okay.
I was just having a round of toast, but I can make you some?
-You’re all right, love. I’m fine. -[chattering on TV]
Are the kids not up yet?
-They’re all right, aren’t they? -Sleepover.
translation.ko: - 어디 아픈 건 아니지? - 친구네 집에서 잤어

translation.en: Uh, both of them?
RIPA-18 will give them that support.
translation.ko: 수사권 확대 법안이 도움이 될 겁니다

translation.en: -[MPs shout out on TV] -Vic?
Look. Don’t take this the wrong way. I know you’re disappointed to miss the kids,
translation.ko: 오해하지 마 애들을 못 봐서 섭섭한 건 알겠는데

translation.en: but maybe that’s why it's best that you call ahead if you come around.
translation.ko: 다음에 올 때는 미리 전화하는 게 좋겠어

translation.en: I was hoping we could talk.
Why?
-I’ve said I’m sorry. -Yeah, you always are.
You need help, Dave.
I need a job that pays the bills, Vic.
Yes, and I keep covering for you, so that you can keep it,
translation.ko: - 나한테 필요한 건 직장이야 - 그래 그 직장 때문에 당신 병을 계속 눈감아 왔지만

translation.en: but I’ve stopped being able to stand back and watch.
translation.ko: 당신 이러는 거 더는 못 보겠어

translation.en: -You are getting worse, Dave. -Love, I’m sorry,
translation.ko: 증세가 더 나빠졌어 내가 잘못했어 하지만 대화로 풀 수 있어

translation.en: but we can work through this.
translation.ko: 내가 잘못했어 하지만 대화로 풀 수 있어

translation.en: I’ve met someone.
He was here...
overnight?
Yes.
-Still here? -No.
Look, I... I was gonna tell you.
You farm our kids out so you can have your night together?
translation.ko: 남자랑 자려고 애들을 집 밖으로 내몰아?

translation.en: They’re with their school friends. They’ve had a lovely time.
translation.ko: 친구 집에서 잔 거고 둘 다 좋아했어

translation.en: -Do they know? -They think that he’s a friend.
translation.ko: - 애들도 알아? - 그냥 친구인 줄 알아

translation.en: Dave?
Dave?
Let’s not get divorced yet.
Oh, God, no, we’re not that serious, or anything. It’s early days.
translation.ko: 맙소사, 그 정도로 진지한 사이는 아니야 만난 지 얼마 안 됐고

translation.en: In case anything happens to me at work...
translation.ko: 근무 중에 나한테 무슨 일이 생겨도

translation.en: you’ll still get the pension... if we’re legally married.
translation.ko: 우리가 합법적인 부부면 당신이 연금을 받을 수 있어

translation.en: ...that the Counter-Terrorism and Security Act 2015 simply does not go far enough.
translation.ko: 2015년 대테러 안보법은 부족한 점이 너무나 많습니다

translation.en: -Hi, Chanel. -Yeah, sorry.
-I hope here’s okay. -Oh, fine.
Can I get you anything?
-No, please, let me-- -Uh, maybe later.
Look, I know,
but you just always seemed open to the wider possibilities of a story.
-Not one to regurgitate the press release. -Thanks very much.
translation.ko: - 보도 자료만 베끼는 게 아니라 - 고마워요

translation.en: And for getting in touch.
Julia Montague’s the woman of the hour, so my editor didn’t take much persuading.
translation.ko: 몬터규 장관이 화제의 인물이라서 편집장도 금방 설득됐어요

translation.en: "Woman of the hour?" Talk about an understatement.
You weren't able to give me much detail over the phone.
Yeah, that's right. Well, I just want to stop everyone getting
carried away with this idea that she’s such a brilliant politician.
translation.ko: 몬터규가 위대한 정치인이라고 다들 착각하는 것 같아요

translation.en: -How would you describe her? -A sociopath.
The most dangerous person in the country.
More dangerous than the people she keeps calling "enemies of freedom."
translation.ko: 그 여자가 '자유의 적'이라 부르는 사람들보다 더 위험해요

translation.en: -How’s she dangerous? -She’s got an agenda.
To heighten fear, to destroy debate... and to seize power.
translation.ko: 공포 분위기를 조성해서 토론을 말살하고 정권을 차지하려는 거죠

translation.en: What evidence do you have to substantiate these claims?
I’ve worked for two years in the Home Office,
most of that time in daily contact with Julia Montague.
You were fired, Chanel.
Yeah.
In Whitehall, this isn’t a story.
"Aide gets fired. Aide badmouths minister."
translation.ko: 해고당한 보좌관이 모시던 장관을 험담하는 거잖아요

translation.en: I’m trying to explain how Julia’s different.
You're not explaining how you’re different from other disgruntled former employees.
You’ve got my number and email if you find something concrete.
I hope things work out for you.
[mutters] Fuck off.
Are you getting in? Do you want me to call someone?
translation.ko: 안 탈 거야? - 다른 사람 불러줘? - 그것만은 참아줘

translation.en: -It's the last thing I want you to do. -Open invitation.
translation.ko: - 다른 사람 불러줘? - 그것만은 참아줘 그냥 물어본 거야

translation.en: For decades, the West has been inflicting suffering on the poor and powerless.
translation.ko: 서방 세계는 수십 년간 가난하고 약한 자들에게 고통을 주면서

translation.en: The war in the desert, in the oil fields...
we’ve brought it back to the streets of Britain.
translation.ko: 그 전쟁이 이제는 영국의 거리로 옮겨왔어요

translation.en: There’s kids growing up over here,
all they hear is what’s been done to families and friends over there.
translation.ko: 고향에 남은 가족과 친지가 무슨 일을 당했는지 다 알아요

translation.en: Who can blame them... if they want to push back?
translation.ko: 그래서 복수하려는 건데 누가 그들을 탓할 수 있죠?

translation.en: And when they push back, our politicians act like it’s come from nowhere...
translation.ko: 그런데 이 사람들의 복수를 정치인들은 이유 없는 복수라고 매도하고

translation.en: so they can pass laws restricting our freedoms
and order new attacks against the so-called terrorists.
And guess what, the cycle of violence goes on.
translation.ko: 그럼 어떻게 되죠? 폭력의 악순환만 계속됩니다

translation.en: Always wondered if you’d turn up some time.
Soapbox is not really my thing, mate.
That’s not how you were in Helmand.
That was a crazy time out there.
Trying to put that behind me. I’m making a go of Civvy Street.
translation.ko: 그 시절은 다 잊고 이제 민간인으로 잘살아볼 거야

translation.en: Put PTSD on your job application, who’s going to hire you?
translation.ko: 외상 후 스트레스 증후군 환자를 누가 고용하겠어?

translation.en: Right?
Just because it’s not visible...
Mate, you can’t beat it on your own.
The counseling sessions... they’re really helpful.
translation.ko: 심리 상담을 받으면 정말 많은 도움이 될 거야

translation.en: -There’s a bunch of us now, good-- -I’m good. Thanks.
[clears throat] So, what are you doing now? Police.
Doing what?
-Specialist protection. -Government ministers.
[sighs] Are you fucking kidding me? You’re protecting those wankers?
You turn up after all this time and tell me this shit. What’s that about?
translation.ko: 이제야 찾아와서 이런 개소리를 씨부렁거려? 이게 말이 돼? 진짜 뻔뻔하네

translation.en: You've got a fucking nerve, mate.
I knew you’d understand. Understand... what?
translation.ko: - 넌 이해할 거라 믿었어 - 뭘 이해해?

translation.en: You said it out in Helmand.
You say a lot of stuff when you’ve seen your best mates blown to pieces.
translation.ko: 전우가 죽는 꼴을 보면 많은 말을 하게 되지

translation.en: If you ever found yourself right beside one of those bastards that sent us there,
you’d just close your eyes and pull the trigger?
You’d still have a face.
I’d still have a family.
Doors and seatbelts.
Little bird told me you were Johnny on the spot at the 1st of October?
translation.ko: 10월 1일 열차 테러 현장에 버드 경사가 있었다고요?

translation.en: Yes, sir.
Looks like the Home Secretary couldn’t be in safer hands.
Lavender outbound.
